profile:
Bathroom Renovation, Kitchen Renovation, Basement Renovation

Our process begins in the comfort of your home with a complimentary consultation. A qualified renovator will take you through our virtual gallery showing off hundreds of inspirational ideas featuring real kitchen & bathroom renovations we have completed, or are capable of offering. Have something else in mind? Splendid! We are sleuths at sourcing hard-to-find products. Together, we’ll discover functional solutions and fashionable options that suit your tastes. Once this process is complete, we’ll present you with a quote and a comprehensive plan encompassing the layout, products and details of your renovation.

As soon as you give us the green light to begin your project, we will prepare a detailed contract and a comfortable payment schedule.Then you can sit back and leave the rest to us! One of our Project Managers will coordinate with our team of skilled drywallers, carpenters, plumbers and electricians so that your dream kitchen or bathroom renovation runs smoothly. In our experience, dealing with one person is much easier for you and ensures the job is done right – the first time!

During the renovation process, rest assured we will treat your home as if it was our own. From drop sheets to vent filters, we’ll create a “bubble” around the project area to keep the space clean with minimal disruption to your household. Upon completion of the project, a cleaning crew will ensure your new kitchen or bathroom is pristine – ready to enjoy immediately – and for years to come.

For added peace of mind, we are proud to guarantee all our Toronto kitchen and bathroom renovation work for 5 years. That’s our commitment and it’s what makes the Kitchen & Bath Guys the definitive choice for discriminating homeowners… like you!

profile:
Excellent Quality at a Fair Price
Properly installed fencing creates safety for your children, safety for your pets.  Properly installed decking creates beautiful and functional outdoor living space for you to enjoy with family and friends.  Why work with Ajax Fence Ltd?

We offer quality work at a fair price.

A fence is an investment in your home’s value, so you want it to stand the test of time. We can provide references from customers we've worked with over the past 40 years. We build to last. Our workmanship is excellent, so you’re never left chasing after a company for repairs.  We never overinflate our prices – we have been building fences right for over 40 years, at a fair price.

We hire only experienced full time staff.

At Ajax Fence our staff are fully experienced... some have been building fences right for close to 40 years! Employing only experienced fence builders ensures every fence is built to our exacting standards – and will last.

We only use quality materials, and do not skimp.

While some companies may offer lower prices, our jobs are priced fairly while providing proper construction using quality materials. A fence board can be installed using only one nail, or it can be done correctly to ensure it lasts.

We have history and connection.

Mark Pierson started Ajax Fence and oversees every quote, every job site and is often hands on.  We're excited that the next generation, Derek Pierson, is now taking an active role in the operation of the company.  You know who you’re working with, who is in charge of the job, and you know it will be installed correctly.

As there is no governing body for fence building – be clear of the details on any quotes you receive.  Is the installer experienced?  Does the company qualify for a current WSIB clearance certificate?  Does the company carry adequate commercial liability insurance?  Are future repair costs going to outweigh your initial savings on a lower quality of workmanship and product?

Call or email now for QUALITY fence and deck installation.

profile:
The foundation of our company is based on servicing customers with quality craftsmanship, timeliness and trust. Grandview Design & Build is an active 360 degree renovations company for home owners, real estate agents and investors. 

We understand that every project and client is different. This is why we provide a personable approach when discussing budget, timelines and preferences. Our trusted suppliers and contractors help us ensure each job operates seamlessly and that our clients stay top of mind. 

The culture at Grandview Design & Build is unique because we love what we do! Every customer provides us an opportunity to  collaborate with their vision and support them with our expertise. This is a honour that we cherish and build upon. 

We take pride on offering the highest level of customer service and dexterity to your project.

profile: RIGHT CHOICE RENOS was founded on the principles of providing honest, reliable and ethical work at a fair price specializing in Home Renovation and Electrical work. Sean D'Aguiar has over 15 years experience with dealing with various trades. Brad Emmons,owner of EMMONS ELECTRIC is a Master Electrician and ACP certified who has over 20 years experience in the industry. Together we have a combined knowledge and appreciation of the overall process and requirements to get the project completed in a time efficient manner. We understand that renovation projects can be a stressful process. We treat every project as though it is our own and hope to provide the most pleasurable experience to every customer.
services:
ACCESSIBILITY 
From design to implementation we can build accessibility ramps, decks bathrooms and more. 

BASEMENT RENOVATIONS
From start to finish we take care of the planning, demolition, wall construction, electrical work, insulation, soundproofing ceiling, drywall, door installation, new floors, painting and much more.
Separate entrance-way, In-law suites, Bedrooms, Kitchens, Playrooms, Bathrooms, Laundry Rooms and More.

CEILINGS
Upgrading your home with ceiling renovations is a surefire way of improving the quality and value of your home and will give it a new modern look. We offer installation of drop ceilings, smooth ceilings, pot-lights, coffered ceilings and more. 

DECKS
Whether you are looking to repair/refinish an existing deck or to build your dream deck we can take care of it all. From design and planning to reality.  We offer flat decks, raised decks, multi-level decks, stairways and accessible ramps and more.

DEMOLITION/CONSTRUCTION CLEANUP
As part of any renovation project demolition is always one of the first steps. we take care of all demolition and garbage removal associated.

DRYWALLING
Complete repair and refinish of existing and new drywall on walls and ceilings.

ELETRICAL
We offer fully licensed services which include complete re-wiring of existing service, knob & tube removal, aluminum wiring, trouble shooting & repairs, radiant floor heat, lighting, pool and spa Hook-ups, Panel & Service upgrades, layout and design. 

FLOORING
We can take care of all your flooring needs; from the subfloor to the installation  of carpet, tile floors, laminate or vinyl

GARAGE AND SHED CONSTRUCTION  
Need some additional storage or need some power installed? We can help by adding or upgrading an electrical service,  shelving, repairs to existing building to design and build of your new garbage, storage shed, pool house or workshop.

GARAGE DOORS
Looking to add extra space or replace that old door; We offer full Garage Builds, Door openers, Garage door upgrades, capping, interior access doors, removal and installation.

GENERAL CONTRACTING
We manage all aspects of the project from start to finish which include; design and planning, drawings, permits and inspections.

HANDYMAN SERVICES
From minor repairs to your full renovation projects, we can help with it all.  

HVAC 
Fully licensed to supply and install new furnace upgrades, fireplaces, air-conditioners, hot water tanks and on demand hot water units. 

KITCHEN RENOVATIONS
Kitchens are the heart of the home, a gathering place for family and friends to cook, eat and entertain. We provide full kitchen remodeling to simply updating your existing kitchen. We can help with the installation of cabinet lighting, new floors, pot lights or even a back-splash. 

PAINTING
We provide services for painting which include; ceilings, interior and exterior walls (brick,wood and aluminum siding), decks, sheds, fences and more.
name: Right Choice Renos Inc.

profile:
East Pro Contracting Group offers commercial and residential services in the east GTA and surrounding areas. 

With over 15 years of experience renovating kitchens, bathrooms, basements, offices and more, we provide all the necessary resources to assist with preparing creative designs as well as managing and completing your project on budget, on time and with the highest level of quality workmanship. 

Whether we are drawing inspiration from modern trends, finding unique solutions to renovation challenges or simply creating a space that showcases your true colours, we can help to customize a plan and create a budget for your next project!

Service areas include (but not necessarily limited to) Scarborough, East York, North York, Markham, Stouffville, Claremont, Uxbridge, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Courtice, Bowmanville.
